      • startRadarLocation

        boolean startRadarLocation(android.content.Context context,
                           java.lang.String tag,
                           int bank,
                           int ptr,
                           IUHFRadarLocationCallback locationCallback)
        开始定位
        Start location
        Parameters:
        context - context
        tag - 要定位的标签(locate to the label)
        bank - 标签的存储区(Storage area):#Bank_RESERVED、#Bank_EPC、#Bank_TID、#Bank_USER
        ptr - 起始地址的偏移量(start address)
        Returns:
        true:成功(success) false:失败(failure)
